trans-unit.source: The node that is requesting properties.
The collection of properties for the node.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodePropertiesRequestedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodePropertiesRequestedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of properties for the node that is associated with the <see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodePropertiesRequested" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodePropertiesRequested" /> 事件关联的节点的属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of properties for the node that is associated with the <see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodePropertiesRequested" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的节点的属性的集合<see cref="E:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodePropertiesRequested" />事件。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodePropertiesRequestedEventArgs.PropertySources%2A> property to add a property to a node, see [How to: Extend a SharePoint Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例演示如何使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodePropertiesRequestedEventArgs.PropertySources%2A>属性将属性添加到一个节点，请参阅[如何： 扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: To display a set of read-only data from a SharePoint site as custom properties of a node, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeContext.CreatePropertySourceObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从 SharePoint 站点的只读数据的一组显示为节点的自定义属性，可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeContext.CreatePropertySourceObject%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Extending Server Explorer to Display Web Parts](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-extending-server-explorer-to-display-web-parts.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 扩展服务器资源管理器显示 Web 部件](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-extending-server-explorer-to-display-web-parts.md)。
